subject: Re: [junit] Testing-MailingList wanted
msgSnippet: Hi Wolfgang, to give you a more precise answer I would need to know on which level you want to test. If you want to test the UI and it is HTML based, http-unit
messageBody:
Hi Wolfgang,

to give you a more precise answer I would need to know on which level
you want to test. If you want to test the UI and it is HTML based, http-unit
should fit. I believe it is at source forge, but I'm not that sure

Yours

Johannes Akinlaja

----- Original Message -----
From: "Egger, Wolfgang" <beuys@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 14, 2001 3:02 PM
Subject: [junit] Testing-MailingList wanted


> Servus,
>
> I'm a QM and I have to install some TestProcedures.
> For some reasons UnitTests with JUnit are suitable.
> But we are developin a distributet web-based System with our own
> MiddleWareSystem. To test this it seems, that JUnit is the wron one. So
I'm
> looking for a mailinglist or a newsgroup that is dedicated for common
> test-topics.
>
> Please send me an email, if someone konws about such a group or list.
>
> Thanx in advance
>
> Wolfgang Egger
>
>
> To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
